subject: UEFA European Football Championship
Soccer
lead_paragraph: FIFA is set to decide the venues for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups. If the United States wants to win a bid, it should do what France did and send its president to plea.
snippet: FIFA is set to decide the venues for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups. If the United States wants to win a bid, it should do what France did and send its president to plea.
